label: 臨済正宗
本: Obaku Zen: The Emergence of the Third Sect of Zen in Tokugawa Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2000
見出し読み: りんざいしょうしゅう
説明文: True Heirs of the Lin-chi sect.  For intrasectarian purposes, Obaku masters tended to prefer the term Rinzai shōshū, the designation chosen by Mi-yun and Fei-yin to symbolize their dedication to restoring Lin-chi's Ch'an style.  The term Rinzai shōshū" was not originally selected to reflect any polemical evaluations in regard to the Rinzai lineage in Japan, but rather toward other Chinese lineages (p. 221-222n). [黄檗、密雲、費隠]"
